com.google.android.apps.common.testing.ui.espresso.base

Class WindowManagerEventInjectionStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.apps.common.testing.ui.espresso.base.WindowManagerEventInjectionStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventInjectionStrategy

    final class WindowManagerEventInjectionStrategy
extends Object
implements EventInjectionStrategy
    An EventInjectionStrategy that uses the window manager to inject MotionEvents. This strategy supports API level 15 and below.

      • injectKeyEvent

        public boolean injectKeyEvent(android.view.KeyEvent keyEvent)
                       throws InjectEventSecurityException
        Description copied from interface: EventInjectionStrategy
        Injects the given KeyEvent into the android system.
        Specified by:
        injectKeyEvent in interface EventInjectionStrategy
        Parameters:
        keyEvent - The event to inject
        Returns:
        true if the input was inject successfully, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        InjectEventSecurityException - if the MotionEvent would be delivered to an area of the screen that is not owned by the application under test.
